name: Advance Ajax Live Search
author: Yasin Ti

sections.description:
This plugin to search by Author-Tag-Cats-Date And Keyword with Ajax.
Loading Ajax Search.
Eazy To Customize.
Quick and easily access to information.

Usage

  1. To get started, click on the sub-menu Search Me > Search Setting.
  2. You can use shortcode to run searchform.
  3. Example: [Advance_Search_Ajax]
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘Advance-Search-me’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Add the shortcode to your page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the ‘Advance-Search-me’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Add the shortcode to your page.

Can I change the all settings?

Yes. You can edit plugin php file and change the value or title.

Does this plugin has any restriction for usage?

No at all. You can use it for infinity.
